original_title: 封印映像2 呪殺の記録
overview: Cursed Doll: A young girl's birthday celebration is filmed with a mobile phone. The family fun changes drastically when her grandmother attends the party.  Photo Session: During a photo session of a gravure model, the abnormal behaviour of an impatient devotee shocks the staff.  Killer Curse: During an interview on spirit photography, the producers of a supernatural TV program become subjected to a terrible projection.  House Hunting: While a real estate agent guides two newlyweds around an old house, the wife films a mysterious hand reaching inside the camera.  The Ruins: A filming crew visits the site of a suicide victim discovered inside abandoned ruins, where many have died a violent death.
title: Sealed Video 2: Record of Curse
